about_the_game:
Jam Jump is an exciting action-platformer set in the mystical lands of Purnaut. Play as a young knight embarking on a thrilling adventure, facing hordes of enemies and showcasing your agility by traversing scattered islands. The game features diverse enemies, intense boss battles, and engaging puzzles that will test your skills and strategy. With each level, the challenges grow more difficult, demanding quick reflexes and clever problem-solving. Get ready to jump, fight, and puzzle your way through an epic journey in Jam Jump!

Key Features:

  • Action-Packed Gameplay

     Experience fast-paced action as you battle through hordes of enemies, utilizing a variety of combat skills to defeat them.

  • Challenging Platforming

     Navigate through treacherous islands and obstacles, requiring precise jumps and agile movements to survive and progress.

  • Intense Boss Battles

     Face off against formidable bosses at the end of each stage, each presenting unique challenges and requiring strategic combat to overcome.

  • Engaging Puzzles

     Solve intriguing puzzles that are interwoven with the platforming and combat elements, adding depth and variety to the gameplay.

  • Diverse Environments

     Explore beautifully crafted levels set in different parts of the magical land, each with its own unique visual style and challenges.

highlighted.name: Collect at least five games at each level

Feature List


About the Game



Jam Jump is an exciting action-platformer set in the mystical lands of Purnaut. Play as a young knight embarking on a thrilling adventure, facing hordes of enemies and showcasing your agility by traversing scattered islands. The game features diverse enemies, intense boss battles, and engaging puzzles that will test your skills and strategy. With each level, the challenges grow more difficult, demanding quick reflexes and clever problem-solving. Get ready to jump, fight, and puzzle your way through an epic journey in Jam Jump!

name: Jam Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Jam Jump is an action-platformer adventure where you guide a young knight through challenging trials, battling hordes of enemies, and navigating treacherous islands with agility and skill.
